filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectTitoloPerLegame
filter.condition: bid_base = :XXXbid_base

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectDocumentoPerLegame
filter.condition: bid_base = :XXXbid_base AND cd_natura != 'A'

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectTitoloPerTitoloAccesso
filter.condition: bid_base = :XXXbid_base AND ( cd_natura = 'D' OR cd_natura = 'B' OR cd_natura = 'P' OR cd_natura = 'T' )

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectPerTitAccesso
filter.condition: bid_base = :XXXbid_base AND ( cd_natura = 'D' OR cd_natura = 'B' OR cd_natura = 'P' OR cd_natura = 'T' )

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectPerTitUniforme
filter.condition: bid_base = :XXXbid_base AND ( cd_natura = 'D' OR cd_natura = 'B' OR cd_natura = 'P' OR cd_natura = 'T' )

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectPerDocumento
filter.condition: bid_base = :XXXbid_base AND cd_natura IN( 'D' , 'B' , 'P' , 'T' )

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_countPerTitAccesso
filter.condition: bid_base = :XXXbid_base AND cd_natura IN( 'D' , 'B' , 'P' , 'T' )

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_countPerTitUniforme
filter.condition: bid_base = :XXXbid_base AND cd_natura IN( 'D' , 'B' , 'P' , 'T' )

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_countPerDocumento
filter.condition: bid_base = :XXXbid_base AND cd_natura IN( 'D' , 'B' , 'P' , 'T' )

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectLegameSuperiore
filter.condition: bid_base = :XXXbid_base AND fl_canc !='S' AND tp_legame = '01' AND cd_natura_coll != 'C'

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectMonografiaSuperiore
filter.condition: bid_base = :XXXbid_base AND fl_canc !='S' AND tp_legame = '01' AND cd_natura_coll IN ('M','S')

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectMonografiaSuperioreBis
filter.condition: bid_base = :XXXbid_base AND fl_canc !='S' AND tp_legame = '01' AND cd_natura_coll = 'M'

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectCollane
filter.condition: fl_canc != 'S' AND bid_base = :XXXbid_base AND tp_legame = '01' AND cd_natura_coll = 'C'

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectRelTitUniMus
filter.condition: fl_canc != 'S' AND bid_base = :XXXbid_base AND tp_legame = '09' AND cd_natura_coll = 'A' AND tp_materiale = 'U'

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectPerDocumentoPerTpLegame
filter.condition: fl_canc != 'S' AND bid = :XXXbid AND tp_legame_musica = :XXXtp_legame_musica

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_countPerDocumentoPerTpLegame
filter.condition: fl_canc != 'S' AND bid = XXXbid AND tp_legame_musica = XXXtp_legame_musica

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectPerNomeLikePerTpLegame
filter.condition: fl_canc !='S' AND tp_legame_musica = :XXXtp_legame_musica

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_countPerNomeLikePerTpLegame
filter.condition: fl_canc !='S' AND tp_legame_musica = :XXXtp_legame_musica

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectPerNomeEsattoPerTpLegame
filter.condition: fl_canc !='S' AND tp_legame_musica = :XXXtp_legame_musica AND ( ( ky_cles1_t = :XXXstringaEsatta1 AND ky_cles2_t = :XXXstringaEsatta2 ) OR ( ky_cles1_ct = :XXXstringaEsatta1 AND ky_cles2_ct = :XXXstringaEsatta2 ) )

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_countPerNomeEsattoPerTpLegame
filter.condition: fl_canc !='S' AND tp_legame_musica = :XXXtp_legame_musica AND ( ( ky_cles1_t = :XXXstringaEsatta1 AND ky_cles2_t = :XXXstringaEsatta2 ) OR ( ky_cles1_ct = :XXXstringaEsatta1 AND ky_cles2_ct = :XXXstringaEsatta2 ) )

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_selectPerCletPerTpLegame
filter.condition: fl_canc !='S' AND tp_legame_musica = :XXXtp_legame_musica AND ky_cles1_t LIKE :XXXstringaClet1 || '%' AND ky_clet2_t = :XXXstringaClet2

filter.name: VL_TITOLO_TIT_B_countPerCletPerTpLegame
filter.condition: fl_canc !='S' AND tp_legame_musica = :XXXtp_legame_musica AND ky_cles1_t LIKE :XXXstringaClet1 || '%' AND ky_clet2_t = :XXXstringaClet2
